content: refresh your kitchen with this easy textured hot pad pattern the delicate puff creates little bumps that help protect against the heat this project isn t too thick so you can use it as a dishcloth or a washcloth the texture offers the right surface for gentle scraping to make it even more convenient a simple loop in the corner makes it easy to hang the piece measures about 20×20 cm ~7 8×7 8 inches and uses a combination of basic stitches and puff you can use any type of cotton sport-weight yarn the pattern was first published on the yourcrochet website **now available on crochetpedia** link 1 1 https //crochetpedia com/puffy-hot-pad-free-crochet-pattern/
